title: Bug that boots you from a game
body: I really dont think its very fair to be booted from multiple games because of some kind of bug. The launcher will start then it goes back to the client saying i couldnt connect. Ive never had this problem before and because of it i now have to wait 20 mins for 5 games before it even puts me in q. Im making this thread in hopes of someone in support to see this because im not sure how long it takes to respond to a ticket

replies.body: It kind of sounds like you were disconnected from the match and you were seeing the "unable to reconnect" messages? If that's the case, it's pretty likely your network wasn't able to get a strong enough signal with that game server from firewalls or just bad routing possibly. Check out the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) if that ever happens so you don't keep getting afks which would eventually add up to LPQ's.
